::Firaxis::
       He looks at him in disbelief.  " 'It has to be here' you say?  And 
why, pray tell must it be here, good sir?  I really must know.  It's not like 
you need atmosphere.  You could be holding this on a deserted, lifeless world 
and no one would care.  Instead it's here.  Thus I must repeat.  GET OUT!"  
He folds his arms across his chest and glares.

--part1_bd.2a77ceb6.2b086c78_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
